description: Humorous punchline about a knife dressing up
title: Sharp Dresser
n_1: Knife and Fork were having a conversation in the kitchen.
c1_1: I think I'll wear a suit today.
n_2: Knife smiled, looking at his reflection.
c1_3: Yes, it's important to make a good impression.
c2_3: Well, you certainly look sharp now.
n_4: Knife adjusted his tie, feeling satisfied.
